Skill Notes:
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 8 from any)
Ruffian: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Assurance (Athletics): Can take an automatic 21 on Athletics checks
Cloud Jump: Triples the distance of long jumps, increases high jump distance to normal long jump distance, and adds 25' to jump distances for every additional action spent
Combat Climber: Can Climb with a hand occupied, can fight while Climbing, and Climbing does not inflict flat-footed
Powerful Leap: Can make 5' vertical and +5' horizontal jumps
Quick Climb: Can Climb at full Speed
Quick Jump: Can use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Quick Swim: Can Swim at full Speed
Rapid Mantel: Can stand immediately after a successful Grab An Edge and use Athletics to Grab An Edge
Combat
Hit Points: 41 Armor Class: 17 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Rogue: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Light Hammer (+5 1d6 B R20'; strength; trained); Pick (+5 1d6 P [Crit d10]; strength; trained); Sickle (+7 1d4 S; dexterity; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +9
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Ruffian: Defense Trained (Medium Armor)
Unconventional Weaponry (Blowgun): Weapon Familiarity (Blowgun)
Brutal Beating: Critical successes on Strikes inflict frightened 1
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer off-guard vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of equal or lower level
Mobility: Can Stride at half Speed without triggering reactions
Ruffian: Can sneak attack using any weapon other than simple or martial weapons that deal greater than d8 or d6 damage, and critical hits with one of these weapons on an off-guard foe inflict its critical specialization effect
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a off-guard foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Titan Wrestler: Can use Disarm, Grapple, Shove, and Trip on creatures up to 3 sizes larger
Underwater Marauder: Does not suffer flat-footed or penalties using bludgeoning and slashing melee weapons in water
Save: Fortitude: +8 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +9 (wisdom; expert)
Notes
Validation Errors:
Cloud Jump Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and athletics rank (currently 4) >= 4
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 5 available vs. 10 allocated
Quick Climb Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and athletics rank (currently 4) >= 3
Quick Swim Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and athletics rank (currently 4) >= 3
